member.name: P:TelnetSrv.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:TelnetSrv.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:TelnetSrv.My.Resources.Resources

member.name: P:TelnetSrv.TelnetSrv.Client.UID
member.summary: The UID used to keep track of the client. This is actualy a string of bytes made of the remote ip and port number.
